Layer 2: API Management, Azure Entra & Content Filter Security
üîê Azure Entra ID Identity & Access Management
Authentication Process: ‚Ä¢ OAuth 2.0 token validation ‚Ä¢ Role-based access control (RBAC) ‚Ä¢ Sales VP permissions verification ‚Ä¢ Financial data access approval
üåê API Management Gateway Request/Response Processing
Gateway Functions: ‚Ä¢ Rate limiting (100 req/min for VP) ‚Ä¢ Request transformation & validation ‚Ä¢ Load balancing to agent clusters ‚Ä¢ Circuit breaker pattern implementation
